com.avaya.ic.sdk
Interface VoiceMediaInteraction

All Superinterfaces:
MediaInteraction
public interface VoiceMediaInteraction
extends MediaInteraction

Represents a voice call.

Nested Class Summary
static class VoiceMediaInteraction.Abandoned
          Indicates that the voice call was abandoned.
static class VoiceMediaInteraction.AudioSource
          Defines the audio source to which the agent is connected during a consultation
static class VoiceMediaInteraction.AudioSourceChanged
          Indicates that the audio source has changed.
static class VoiceMediaInteraction.DestinationBusy
          Indicates that the audio communication path could not be established with the callee because the callee's device is busy.
static class VoiceMediaInteraction.DestinationConnected
          Indicates that the audio communication path was established during a consult or conference operation.
static class VoiceMediaInteraction.Diverted
          Indicates that the voice call was diverted.
static class VoiceMediaInteraction.Operation
           
static class VoiceMediaInteraction.OperationFailed
          Indicates that an asynchronous operation performed on the VoiceMediaInteraction failed.
static class VoiceMediaInteraction.Transferred
          Indicates that transfer initiator has completed the transfer.
 
Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.avaya.ic.sdk.MediaInteraction
MediaInteraction.OperationSucceeded, MediaInteraction.ParentMediaChanged, MediaInteraction.PartyAdded, MediaInteraction.PartyDropped, MediaInteraction.State, MediaInteraction.StateChanged, MediaInteraction.Type
 
Method Summary
 java.lang.String getAni()

          Get The DNIS (Dialed Number Identification Service), which is the number that was dialed by the calling party.

          Sends DTMF digits on the current voice call represented by this VoiceMediaInteraction.

Method Detail

getAni

java.lang.String getAni()
Get The ANI (Automatic Number Identification), which is for telephone number of the calling party.

Returns:
The ANI (Automatic Number Identification), which is for telephone number of the calling party.

getDnis

java.lang.String getDnis()
Get The DNIS (Dialed Number Identification Service), which is the number that was dialed by the calling party.

Returns:
The DNIS (Dialed Number Identification Service), which is the number that was dialed by the calling party.

Get The audio source to which the agent is connected during a consultative transfer

Returns:

isOutbound

boolean isOutbound()
Get True if this is an outbound call, otherwise false.

Returns:
True if this is an outbound call, otherwise false.

hold

void hold()
Places the voice call on hold.

reconnect

void reconnect()
Takes the voice call off hold.

sendDTMFDigits

void sendDTMFDigits(java.lang.String digits)
Sends DTMF digits on the current voice call represented by this VoiceMediaInteraction.

IC Properties that affect this API:
Agent/Desktop/Voice/KeyPadEnabled

Parameters:
digits - DTMF digits

swapAudio

void swapAudio()
Switch audio path to the other participant in a consult scenario. If the audio path to the destination is currently open then calling this method will switch the audio path to the originator and vice versa
